data.text: @ChristyCeeCK It’s so disappointing to see how all levels of government are hiding the real numbers. I guess they think we are stupid??

@ChristyCeeCK I asked my eldest how he feels about going back after march break. He told me we could watch the numbers to see when it was safe. Except there aren't any numbers anymore.

My 9 year old gets it and 😭😭
@ChristyCeeCK “Canada’s abandoning of covid testing leaves us free from blame for future variants, politicians say”
@ChristyCeeCK Respectfully, we didn't need experts to tell us this.
